work.name: MBZUAI
work.summary: Research on privacy risks of spiking neural networks against membership inference attacks. Contributed to torchgfn with graphical environment for GFlowNet analysis. Developed agentic framework for diverse melody generation via GFlowNet-finetuned LLMs. Focus on probabilistic generative modeling and cybersecurity applications.
highlights: Worked on privacy risks of spiking neural networks against membership inference attacks
Contributed to torchgfn with graphical environment for GFlowNet analysis
Developed agentic framework for diverse melody generation via GFlowNet-finetuned LLMs
Research focus on probabilistic generative modeling and cybersecurity applications

work.name: University of Waterloo AI Institute
work.summary: Built adversarial test features for autonomous vehicle visual AI (AVL Scenius). Developed CARLA-based real-time object detection testing framework. Proposed a KDE-based classifier for adversarial vs regular vehicle identification. Collaborated with AVL on autonomous vehicle safety testing.
highlights: Built adversarial test features for autonomous vehicle visual AI (AVL Scenius)
Developed CARLA-based real-time object detection testing framework
Proposed a KDE-based classifier for adversarial vs regular vehicle identification
Collaborated with AVL on autonomous vehicle safety testing

work.name: TrojAI Inc.
work.summary: Surveyed 100+ physical adversarial threats and designed Multi-Patch attacks. Proposed model-agnostic defenses using scene total-variation metrics. Research on safeguarding vision models against physical adversaries. Thesis work on CNN robustness against physical corruptions.
highlights: Surveyed 100+ physical adversarial threats and designed Multi-Patch attacks
Proposed model-agnostic defenses using scene total-variation metrics
Research on safeguarding vision models against physical adversaries
Thesis work on CNN robustness against physical corruptions
